title: #90: Tanya Zuckerbrot, The F-Factor Diet - Fiber, Protein, Weight Loss and Management, Creating a Caloric Deficit through Addition, and Thermogenesis
itunes:title: #90: Tanya Zuckerbrot, The F-Factor Diet - Fiber, Protein, Weight Loss and Management, Creating a Caloric Deficit through Addition, and Thermogenesis
description:
On this episode we are joined by Tanya Zuckerbrot (@tanyazuckerbrot) , MS, RD, the founder and CEO of F-Factor Diet. Tanya is a wealth of knowledge and goes into detail about how adding fiber to your diet is the key to weight loss and management. We discuss Fiber and Protein, Weight Loss and Management, Creating a Caloric Deficit by adding to you diet instead of subtracting and how Thermogenesis works. We also dive into myths about carbs and red meat. You wont want to miss this one!

To connect with Tanya click HERE

To learn more about F-Factor click HERE

To connect with Lauryn click HERE

To connect with Michael click HERE
